    • Method Detail

      • menuID

        public void menuID​(AccessLevel accessLevel,
                   java.lang.String customerID)
        Main account management view and the customerID shall be passed as parameter. The view displayed will be based on the customerID.
        Parameters:
        accessLevel - the access level
        customerID - the customer ID

      • edit

        public void edit​(AccessLevel accessLevel,
                 java.lang.String customerID)
        Editing view for account management. The view will differ based on the customer ID passed in.
        Parameters:
        accessLevel - the access level
        customerID - the customer ID
